prompt: <description>**Instructions to Construct the CAD Model** The final CAD model is a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole on one side. The hole is centered and has a diameter equal to the width of the prism. The prism is slightly tilted to the right. The model consists of three parts. **Part 1** Construct a rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0797, 0.0] Then, create a new sketch on face 1 of the coordinate system. The sketch should contain the following loops and curves: - Loop 1: - Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.0] - Line 2: Start Point [0.75, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.75] - Line 3: Start Point [0.75, 0.75], End Point [0.0, 0.75] - Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.75], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75. Extrude the sketch to a depth of 0.45 in the negative direction of the normal. **Part 2** Create a CAD model of a symmetrical object with four identical circular cutouts arranged in a square pattern. The object is centered and has a flat base. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0703, 0.0797, 0.0703] Then, create four sketches on faces 1, 2, 3, and 4 of the coordinate system. Each sketch should contain a single loop with a circular curve: - Sketch 1: - Circle 1: Center [0.1172, 0.1172], Radius 0.1172 - Sketch 2: - Circle 1: Center [0.1172, 0.4922], Radius 0.1172 - Sketch 3: - Circle 1: Center [0.4922, 0.1172], Radius 0.1172 - Sketch 4: - Circle 1: Center [0.4922, 0.4922], Radius 0.1172 Scale each sketch by a factor of 0.6094. Extrude the sketches to a depth of 0.0797 in the positive direction of the normal. **Part 3** Create a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [180.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.6797, 0.5297, 0.0703] Then, create a new sketch on face 1 of the coordinate system.
